common.msg.user

Interface IInvite2RoomMsg

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IMsg, IUserMsg, java.io.Serializable

    public interface IInvite2RoomMsg
extends IUserMsg
    IInvite2RoomMsg is sent to the user you want to invite to your chatroom When implementing it, you should create a IChatroom field and use it to construct this object E.g. IChatroom chatroom; MyInvite2RoomMsg(IChatroom cr); Also there is a getter to get the chatroom. Implementation advice for Invite2RoomMsgCmd: #1 Create localChatroom and localChatServer #2 Add all the ChatServers in the chatroom (including localChatServer) to the localChatroom's ChatServerlist and add localChatroom to the IUser's chatroom list #3 Send AddMeMsg(localChatServer wrapped inside) to all the original chatServers
    Author:
    Evita
